title: Blended Learning Design and Implementation Strategies for Saudi Higher Education

context.prior_knowledge: Science subject teaching experience and proficiency in basic digital tools
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based learning environment, requiring practical strategies immediately applicable in university settings.

learning_goals: Can explain three or more instructional design frameworks for applying blended learning models to science classes
Can propose specific methods for designing smartphone-based learning activities in limited technology environments
Can derive two or more sustainable support systems (certification systems, performance recognition, etc.) for implementing blended learning

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
